hints.content: So on the number line, we start at $61$ and move **right** $\purpleD{20}$ and then $\maroonD7$ more.

This number line shows $61 + 27$:

![A number line starts at 61 with plus 2 and goes to 63. From 63 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5528a543e572114c006ce2284b799b44365271d6)

choices.content: ![A number line starts at 61 with plus 20 and goes to 81. From 81 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/5528a543e572114c006ce2284b799b44365271d6)
![A number line starts at 16 with plus 20 and goes to 36. From 36 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f0548657f795cfdc58d742e815506aba5a42ce2a)
![A number line starts at 61 with plus 2 and goes to 63. From 63 plus 7 goes to ?.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8dc582c6588ec5f28e80ad7889c9bf4fe7f16e5c)
